price: Huyu si lolote ila ni mtu mwenye wazimu. Basi mngojeeni tu kwa muda.
arabic: إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا رَجُلُۢ بِهِۦ جِنَّةٞ فَتَرَبَّصُواْ بِهِۦ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ
footnotes: Huyu si chochote ila ni mtu mwenye wazimu. Na kwa hivyo wakasema: Ngojeni, na mstahamilieni mpaka ukashifike wazimu wake, au kufike kuangamia kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: in huwa illā rajulun bihi jinnatun fatarabbaṣū bihi ḥattā ḥīnin
